Katrina Kaif Biography | Wiki | Age | Net Worth | Affairs | Controversies

Bolly Reporter
9 months ago

Katrina Kaif is a British Indian Film Actress and Model. She has a huge fan following in the Bollywood film industry and is one of India’s highest-paid actresses. At the age of fourteen, she won a beauty contest in Hawaii. She was debuted in Indian movie with English-Hindi erotic heist film Boom with Amitabh Bachchan. Boom (2003) had its first screening at the Cannes Film Festival and was heavily promoted at the event.

Biography & Wiki

Katrina Kaif’s nickname is Kat. She was born on 16 July 1983 in Hong Kong. Hence, her current age is 36 years. Katrina’s Zodiac is Cancer. She is in several countries before she moved to London. Katrina is Muslim by Religion and Nationality is British.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Katrina’s father’s name is Mohammed Kaif who is a British businessman of Kashmiri Indian descent. Her mother’s name is Suzanne Turquotte (also spelled Susanna) who is an English lawyer and charity worker. She has one elder brother Michael Kaif and six sisters named, Stephanie, Christine, Natasha, Melissa, Sonia and Isabel. Due to their frequent relocation, Katrina Kaif and her siblings never went to any school and they were home-schooled by a series of tutors.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Katrina’s personal life is always an interesting subject to media and Bollywood lovers. In stating of her career she was in a relationship with Salman Khan. They had a breakup in 2010 and Katrina calling it her “first serious relationship”. She falls in love with Ranbir Kapoor during the filming of Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani. Her current relationship status is Unmarried.

Favorite Things and Hobbies

Katrina Kaif filmography

Katrina works in Bollywood Film Industry and few Telugu, Malayalam Movies. She worked many commercial successful movies such as New York, Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani, Raajneeti, Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara, Mere Brother Ki Dulhan, Ek Tha Tiger, Dhoom 3, Bang Bang, etc. Kaif’s career prospects changed in 2007 when she appeared in four Bollywood hits.

Katrina Kaif is the recipient of several awards, including “BIG Star Entertainment Awards”, “Screen Awards”, “Star Guild Awards”, “Stardust Awards”, “Zee Cine Awards” etc. for her contribution in Indian Film Industry. Kaif’s highest-grossing films Ek Tha Tiger (2012), Dhoom 3 (2013) and ‘Tiger Zinda Hai’ (2017) rank among the highest-grossing Indian films of all time.

Salary and Net Worth

Katrina’s immovable property amounting to Rs.142 crore. Her annual income is Rs 29 crore from movies and various brand endorsement. Katrina owns many expensive cars like Audi Q3, Mercedes ML350, Audi Q7. She owns a Bungalow in Hampstead, London worth Rs 7.02 crore. Furthermore, she has 3 BHK Apartment in Bandra, Apartment in Lokhandwala and one Penthouse in Bandra.

Education and School, College

Katrina has homeschooling (Taught at home by her mother, tutors and also did correspondence courses)

Facts about Katrina Kaif

  • She also helps her mom in charitable activities and also she endorses one of the biggest brands in the world.
  • Her personal photos with Ex-boyfriend Ranbir Kapoor were leaked on the internet during their trip to Ibiza.
  • During the shooting of the film Namastey London, Katrina went to Ajmer Sharif dargah in a short skirt that hurt people’s religious sentiments.
  • Before New York, Katrina Kaif’s voice was dubbed over by voice artists in most of her films due to her lack of fluency in Hindi and other Indian languages.
  • Although she appeared in a series of successful films, critics noted that she had little to do in them as they were generally male-dominated.
  • She is the first Bollywood actress to have a Barbie doll crafted in her image.
  • Ayesha Shroff, wife of Jackie Shroff and the producer of her debut film Boom changed her second name from Turquotte to Kaif, as she thought that it was not catchy and is difficult to pronounce.
